argumentText:
ARGUMENT
r s

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | issubrg.b | |- B = ( Base ` R ) |
| 2 |  | issubrg.i | |- .1. = ( 1r ` R ) |
| 3 |  | #P_df-subrg | |- SubRing = ( r e. Ring |-> { s e. ~P ( Base ` r ) | ( ( r |`s s ) e. Ring /\ ( 1r ` r ) e. s ) } ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_dmmptss | |- dom SubRing C_ Ring |
| 5 |  | #P_elfvdm | |- ( A e. ( SubRing ` R ) -> R e. dom SubRing ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_sseldi | |- ( A e. ( SubRing ` R ) -> R e. Ring ) |
| 7 |  | #P_simpll | |- ( ( ( R e. Ring /\ ( R |`s A ) e. Ring ) /\ ( A C_ B /\ .1. e. A ) ) -> R e. Ring ) |
| 8 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( r = R -> ( Base ` r ) = ( Base ` R ) ) |
| 9 | 8, 1 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( r = R -> ( Base ` r ) = B ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_pweqd | |- ( r = R -> ~P ( Base ` r ) = ~P B ) |
| 11 |  | #P_oveq1 | |- ( r = R -> ( r |`s s ) = ( R |`s s ) ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_eleq1d | |- ( r = R -> ( ( r |`s s ) e. Ring <-> ( R |`s s ) e. Ring ) ) |
| 13 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( r = R -> ( 1r ` r ) = ( 1r ` R ) ) |
| 14 | 13, 2 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( r = R -> ( 1r ` r ) = .1. ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_eleq1d | |- ( r = R -> ( ( 1r ` r ) e. s <-> .1. e. s ) ) |
| 16 | 12, 15 | #P_anbi12d | |- ( r = R -> ( ( ( r |`s s ) e. Ring /\ ( 1r ` r ) e. s ) <-> ( ( R |`s s ) e. Ring /\ .1. e. s ) ) ) |
| 17 | 10, 16 | #P_rabeqbidv | |- ( r = R -> { s e. ~P ( Base ` r ) | ( ( r |`s s ) e. Ring /\ ( 1r ` r ) e. s ) } = { s e. ~P B | ( ( R |`s s ) e. Ring /\ .1. e. s ) } ) |
| 18 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( Base ` R ) e. _V |
| 19 | 1, 18 | #P_eqeltri | |- B e. _V |
| 20 | 19 | #P_pwex | |- ~P B e. _V |
| 21 | 20 | #P_rabex | |- { s e. ~P B | ( ( R |`s s ) e. Ring /\ .1. e. s ) } e. _V |
| 22 | 17, 3, 21 | #P_fvmpt | |- ( R e. Ring -> ( SubRing ` R ) = { s e. ~P B | ( ( R |`s s ) e. Ring /\ .1. e. s ) } ) |
| 23 | 22 | #P_eleq2d | |- ( R e. Ring -> ( A e. ( SubRing ` R ) <-> A e. { s e. ~P B | ( ( R |`s s ) e. Ring /\ .1. e. s ) } ) ) |
| 24 |  | #P_oveq2 | |- ( s = A -> ( R |`s s ) = ( R |`s A ) ) |
| 25 | 24 | #P_eleq1d | |- ( s = A -> ( ( R |`s s ) e. Ring <-> ( R |`s A ) e. Ring ) ) |
| 26 |  | #P_eleq2 | |- ( s = A -> ( .1. e. s <-> .1. e. A ) ) |
| 27 | 25, 26 | #P_anbi12d | |- ( s = A -> ( ( ( R |`s s ) e. Ring /\ .1. e. s ) <-> ( ( R |`s A ) e. Ring /\ .1. e. A ) ) ) |
| 28 | 27 | #P_elrab | |- ( A e. { s e. ~P B | ( ( R |`s s ) e. Ring /\ .1. e. s ) } <-> ( A e. ~P B /\ ( ( R |`s A ) e. Ring /\ .1. e. A ) ) ) |
| 29 | 19 | #P_elpw2 | |- ( A e. ~P B <-> A C_ B ) |
| 30 | 29 | #P_anbi1i | |- ( ( A e. ~P B /\ ( ( R |`s A ) e. Ring /\ .1. e. A ) ) <-> ( A C_ B /\ ( ( R |`s A ) e. Ring /\ .1. e. A ) ) ) |
| 31 |  | #P_an12 | |- ( ( A C_ B /\ ( ( R |`s A ) e. Ring /\ .1. e. A ) ) <-> ( ( R |`s A ) e. Ring /\ ( A C_ B /\ .1. e. A ) ) ) |
| 32 | 28, 30, 31 | #P_3bitri | |- ( A e. { s e. ~P B | ( ( R |`s s ) e. Ring /\ .1. e. s ) } <-> ( ( R |`s A ) e. Ring /\ ( A C_ B /\ .1. e. A ) ) ) |
| 33 |  | #P_ibar | |- ( R e. Ring -> ( ( R |`s A ) e. Ring <-> ( R e. Ring /\ ( R |`s A ) e. Ring ) ) ) |
| 34 | 33 | #P_anbi1d | |- ( R e. Ring -> ( ( ( R |`s A ) e. Ring /\ ( A C_ B /\ .1. e. A ) ) <-> ( ( R e. Ring /\ ( R |`s A ) e. Ring ) /\ ( A C_ B /\ .1. e. A ) ) ) ) |
| 35 | 32, 34 | #P_syl5bb | |- ( R e. Ring -> ( A e. { s e. ~P B | ( ( R |`s s ) e. Ring /\ .1. e. s ) } <-> ( ( R e. Ring /\ ( R |`s A ) e. Ring ) /\ ( A C_ B /\ .1. e. A ) ) ) ) |
| 36 | 23, 35 | #P_bitrd | |- ( R e. Ring -> ( A e. ( SubRing ` R ) <-> ( ( R e. Ring /\ ( R |`s A ) e. Ring ) /\ ( A C_ B /\ .1. e. A ) ) ) ) |
| 37 | 6, 7, 36 | #P_pm5.21nii | |- ( A e. ( SubRing ` R ) <-> ( ( R e. Ring /\ ( R |`s A ) e. Ring ) /\ ( A C_ B /\ .1. e. A ) ) ) |
